data.actual_result: You can use every custom emoji, also animated ones.
data.expected_result: You shouldn't be able to use custom emojis from servers you are not a member of & also not be able to use animated emoji without Discord Nitro
data.short_description: You can use every custom emoji in the channel topic with its ID
data.steps_to_repro: - Get the ID of any emoji that got uploaded to a server you are not a member of - Open any channel and go to the channel topic - Type `<:EmojiName:EmojiID>` (add `a` at the beginning when it is animated) - Save it
